title: PageScan
description:
With PageScan, you can see how your visitors understand your website. This easy tool gives you clear feedback on how to improve your message, helping you know if your audience gets what you’re saying.

It highlights areas that may be confusing, allowing you to make changes for better clarity. By understanding how your visitors perceive your content, you can create a more engaging and effective website. This leads to happier visitors and better results for your business.
